Authors and Citation

Citation

Source: DESCRIPTION

Shima T, Authors of the dependency Rust crates (2025). prqlr: R Bindings for the 'prqlc' Rust Library. R package version 0.10.1.9000, https://prql.github.io/prqlc-r/.
